subject: Attention
body:
Attention
This is to inform you that the total sum of $1,200,000.00 USD ATM Card
have been registered with FedEx for immediate delivery to you by Mrs.
Susan Ngongi Namondo UN Resident Coordinator in Uganda for your compensation.
The $1,200,000.00 USD ATM Card is package is 
ready to be deliver to
you once you forward the below information.
Name
Address
Phone
Nearest Airport
Meanwhile the delivery cost has been paid and the only fee you have to
pay is $100.00 USD for security keeping fee 
and your ATM Card package
fund will be deliver to you within 24 hours once we confirm the fee
through Apple gifts card or steam wallet card as soon as possile.
Contact (
fedexcouriers286@gmail.com
)
Yours Sincerely,
Michael George.
Director

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello Michael George,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this ATM Card. I'm curious, how did Mrs. Susan Ngongi Namondo come to choose me for this? 

Also, could you please explain a bit more about the security keeping fee? What exactly does it cover?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Cherri
